attributes.action: DO NOT ALLOW THE RULING TO PROROGUE PARLIAMENT BE OVERTURNED
attributes.additional_details: We do not need to waste money on second referendums or re elections. Let the money go to our schools, NHS and police instead
attributes.background: We do not want parliament debating Brexit any longer. They have wasted time and money debating and have come up with nothing! They are the ones who are an outrage by trying to turn over the public vote to leave the EU. Let Boris Johnson do his job and get us out of the European Union.
